txt.en: 'Turns out Bingo Boffin has been busy reading about cooking at the Tuckborough library. Everyone saw him there. Well, I am fully dispirited now and ready to hand in the towel.'\n\n'But no, I must persevere! The Party Planning Committee is counting on me, and trust me, friend, you do not want to disappoint the Party Planning Committee! Here, have another reward for all your help.'
'My new suspicion is that adventuring trouble-maker, Bingo Boffin. He is behind all this. Of course I haven't a shred of evidence, but I feel sure that I am right!'
The Anniversary Scavenger Hunt -- Year Five
Complete a Year Five scavenger hunt card for a reward!

Every year in the spring, the Anniversary Scavenger Hunt takes place to celebrate a very special occasion.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
Cards hang from the Party Tree. Each card contains a scavenger hunt to complete at your own pace. When you complete a scavenger hunt, bring the completed card to Waldo Rumble for a reward!
Waldo Rumble can be found next to the Party Tree in the Shire.\n\nYou should speak to Waldo Rumble to receive your reward for completing a scavenger hunt card!
